content: this quick project is perfect for cold drinks on the patio or hot drinks on the go the techniques for this pattern are easy you only need knit and slipped stitches to create the pattern and only one colour of yarn is used at a time this is a great introduction to the techniques used for mosaic knitting sample shown in worsted weight cotton yarn **sizing ** sample is 3 75 /9 5cm wide by 3 5 /8 9cm tall lying flat approximately 2 75 /7cm diameter unstretched it fits a medium takeout coffee or canned/bottled drink well with some stretch to fit other sizes the number of cast on stitches and the number of repeats could be adjusted for other sizes **pattern instructions ** written and charted instructions pattern is worked in the round **pattern support feedback and questions ** melissayukon at hotmail ca or melissayukon 1 on ravelry 1 https //www ravelry com/designers/melissa-mann
